column2: THIS SECTION FOR NEW PIANO STUDENTS ONLY. Students must be available on Monday, January 6 for audition & placement in Mus 179. Auditions will NOT be held on other days. Applicable course fee will be added upon placement.

THIS SECTION FOR NEW VOICE STUDENTS ONLY. Students must be available on Monday, January 6 for audition & placement in the appropriate voice course. Auditions will NOT be held on other days. Applicable course fee will be added upon placement.
